name: One-Page Product Brief
description: Generate a concise one-page product brief for stakeholder alignment, executive reviews, and investment decisions
prompt_text: Write a concise, compelling One-Page Product Brief for the initiative "{initiative_name}" designed to align stakeholders and secure buy-in quickly. The core problem we are solving: "{problem_statement}". The target audience for this initiative is "{target_audience}" -- ground every claim and recommendation in their specific needs and pain points. The primary business impact we expect to drive is {business_impact}, so frame the value proposition and ROI narrative around that axis. Key success metrics to include: "{success_metrics}". Structure the brief with these sections, each no longer than a short paragraph: Problem Statement, Proposed Solution, Target Audience, Value Proposition, Key Success Metrics, High-Level Timeline, Risks and Mitigations, and a clear Ask or Next Steps. Write it in a tone suitable for executive and cross-functional review -- persuasive, evidence-oriented, and free of jargon.

variables.name: problem_statement
variables.label: Problem Statement
variables.placeholder: What problem are we solving? Who is affected? What is the cost of inaction?

variables.name: target_audience
variables.label: Target Audience
variables.placeholder: e.g., Mid-market SaaS companies with 50-200 employees

variables.name: success_metrics
variables.label: Success Metrics
variables.placeholder: e.g., Reduce onboarding time by 40%, increase activation rate to 65%
